# attach(_:)

**Instance Method**

Attaches an audio node to the audio engine.

## Declaration

```swift
func attach(_ node: AVAudioNode)
```

## Parameters

- **node**: The audio node to attach.

## Discussion

An instance of [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioNode] isn’t usable until you attach it to the audio engine using this method.

```swift
// Create a player node that's used for audio playback.
let playerNode = AVAudioPlayerNode()

// Attach the player node to the engine.
engine.attach(playerNode)
```

## Attaching and Detaching Audio Nodes

- **detach(_:)**: Detaches an audio node from the audio engine.
- **attachedNodes**: A read-only set that contains the nodes you attach to the audio engine.
